description: Music video directed by Mayu Ikeda for the song KETATAMA by KERENMI feat. Mori Calliope.

node.description:
**Height:** 167 cm
**Fanbase name:** Dead Beats
**Illustrator:** [Yukisame](https://anilist.co/staff/258988/)

[Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/mori-calliope/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL_qhgtOy0dy1Agp8vkySQg) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/moricalliope) | [SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com/user-694398002) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@moricalliope_hololiveen)

Mori Calliope is a female English Virtual YouTuber endorsed by hololive.

The Grim Reaper's first apprentice. Because the world's medical system advanced so dramatically, Calliope became a VTuber to collect souls. It seems that the lost souls vaporized by the wholesome relationships of VTubers flow through her as well. In the end, she's a gentle-hearted girl whose sweet voice contradicts the morbid things she tends to say, as well as her hardcore vocals.

[Artist Profile (agehasprings)](http://www.ageha.net/archives/ageha_creator/tsutaya_koichi) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/koichitsutaya) | [Spotify ](https://open.spotify.com/artist/7brpGChn7xeqT2dlYy7ZPd?autoplay=true) 

Kouichi Tsutaya is a Japanese musician affiliated with agehasprings, who does music production, composition and arrangement, while also being a lyricist, pianist and keyboardist.

[Artist Profile (agehasprings)](http://www.ageha.net/archives/ageha_creator/tsutaya_koichi) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/koichitsutaya) | [Spotify ](https://open.spotify.com/artist/7brpGChn7xeqT2dlYy7ZPd?autoplay=true)

Graduated from Kyoto University of Arts in 2019. Freelance animator and illustrator living in Tokyo​.
